name: UezCon
0:
”Alexa, turn on kitchen light”
”Alexa, turn off kitchen light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
UezCon is a smart home skill that allow user to control multiple smart devices individually with Alexa. 

UezCon 
Step 1. Download & install "UezCon" from Apple Store or Google Play Store.
Step 2. Sign up a new account. 
Step 3. Setup a new UezCon device within the App.
Step 4. Make sure the device is controllable . 
Step 5. Go to Alexa App. for Skill setup. 

Alexa App
Step 1. Open Skill Page
Step 2. Search "UezCon"
Step 3. Click on "UezCon"
Step 4. Click Enable
Step 5. Login with UezCon account. 
Step 6. Click Discover Devices or say "Alexa, discover device"
Step 7. Check if your bind device on the list. 
Step 8. Enjoy
